class.name: TranslationServer
class.brief_description: The server responsible for language translations.
class.description: The server that manages all language translations. Translations can be added to or removed from it.

method.name: add_translation
method.description: Adds a [Translation] resource.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears the server from all translations.

method.name: compare_locales
method.description: Compares two locales and returns a similarity score between [code]0[/code] (no match) and [code]10[/code] (full match).

method.name: get_all_countries
method.description: Returns an array of known country codes.

method.name: get_all_languages
method.description: Returns array of known language codes.

method.name: get_all_scripts
method.description: Returns an array of known script codes.

method.name: get_country_name
method.description: Returns a readable country name for the [param country] code.

method.name: get_language_name
method.description: Returns a readable language name for the [param language] code.

method.name: get_loaded_locales
method.description: Returns an array of all loaded locales of the project.

method.name: get_locale
method.description: Returns the current locale of the project. See also [method OS.get_locale] and [method OS.get_locale_language] to query the locale of the user system.

method.name: get_locale_name
method.description: Returns a locale's language and its variant (e.g. [code]"en_US"[/code] would return [code]"English (United States)"[/code]).

method.name: get_script_name
method.description: Returns a readable script name for the [param script] code.

method.name: get_tool_locale
method.description: Returns the current locale of the editor. [b]Note:[/b] When called from an exported project returns the same value as [method get_locale].

method.name: get_translation_object
method.description: Returns the [Translation] instance based on the [param locale] passed in. It will return [code]null[/code] if there is no [Translation] instance that matches the [param locale].

method.name: pseudolocalize
method.description: Returns the pseudolocalized string based on the [param message] passed in.

method.name: reload_pseudolocalization
method.description: Reparses the pseudolocalization options and reloads the translation.

method.name: remove_translation
method.description: Removes the given translation from the server.

method.name: set_locale
method.description: Sets the locale of the project. The [param locale] string will be standardized to match known locales (e.g. [code]en-US[/code] would be matched to [code]en_US[/code]). If translations have been loaded beforehand for the new locale, they will be applied.

method.name: standardize_locale
method.description: Returns a [param locale] string standardized to match known locales (e.g. [code]en-US[/code] would be matched to [code]en_US[/code]).

method.name: translate
method.description: Returns the current locale's translation for the given message (key) and context.

method.name: translate_plural
method.description: Returns the current locale's translation for the given message (key), plural message and context. The number [param n] is the number or quantity of the plural object. It will be used to guide the translation system to fetch the correct plural form for the selected language.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], enables the use of pseudolocalization. See [member ProjectSettings.internationalization/pseudolocalization/use_pseudolocalization] for details.
